author: Patricia P
title: Kell's is awesome!
text: Kelly's Courtyard Hotel really was a great surprise in our stay in Beijing. Very close to a metro station and near to the Forbidden City. Mark is the best host ever! he's so kind and attentive, always with a smile to receive us after a long day walking in Beijing! He provided us with a lot of helpful tips. The hotel is wonderful, we really feel like having a chinese experience, the courtyard was unique and there is a nice rooftop terrace. The room was excellent, good bed and hot shower. The breakfast is delicious, an excellent homemade jam and a good coffee. Everything clean, quiet and confortable. There is a fridge with drinks and snacks in a fair price, very good. I'm still dreaming about this place, we loved the time we spent in Kell's and we are excited to meet Mark again, someday!
